Comments_List: We learned how to read, write and speak in Yoruba using acquired vocabulary and different grammar rules. We also learn about Yoruba culture while studying the language.
I developed more insights into the ways the Yoruba language operates and more skills on speaking the language.
I learned more about the Yoruba language and culture.

This course is good for students that want to start learning Yoruba. By the end of it a student can carry out a simple conversation in Yoruba. The course is great since the professor works hard to make sure the material is learned well through repeated exposure. The TA is very helpful in and out of class to help students grasp the language better. The pace of the class can vary a lot week by week: at times it may feel like the class is moving slowly with not much work and at other times it can feel like the material is moving by quickly with a lot of homework.
Strengths: a lot of speaking in class, good homework dedicated to enhancing my knowledge of the Yoruba language
